attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248884. Discover more with the EcoSport urban SUV. The city can serve up plenty of challenges - potholes, burst water pipes, rough roads, you name it. That's why the EcoSport sits high off the ground so you can go over, rather than around obstacles. It's just the right size and combination of power and efficiency for city driving. Give us a call to book your test drive.

The all NEW recently launched 7 seater BR-V 1.5 has arrived and comes in 4 different models : BR-V 1.5 Trend MT, BR-V 1.5 Comfort MT, BR-V 1.5 Comfort CVT & the flagship BR-V 1.5 Elegance CVT. Finance arranged Inhouse  


An amazing colours to compliment a great vehicle.

attributes.description:
NON RECON DEAL
(The car has not been in for any prep work,Valet or repairs etc)

+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)

attributes.description: Vehicle come with balance of the 5yr / 100 000km factory maintenance plan. NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.
